item.title: Worker pools
item.description: A worker pool is a set of threads that are about to process jobs assigned to them. Example package main import ( "fmt" "os" "strconv" "sync" "time" ) type Client struct { id int integer int } type Data struct { job Client square int } var ( size = 10 clients = make(chan Client, size) data = make(chan Data, size) ) func worker(w *sync.WaitGroup) { for c := range clients { square := c.
